Service Details: Gives private organizations, clubs and community groups the opportunity to help the City keep Kelowna beautiful by volunteering their labour to pick up litter along the sides of undeveloped arterial frontages
Address & Map: 1495 Hardy StKelowna, BC     V1Y 7W9View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Yards is located inside the gated area to the right. ; Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Yards is located inside the gated area to the right.
